meaningMnemonic: You weave <radical>gold</radical> and <radical>white</radical> patterns into this <radical>towel</radical>, turning it into <kanji>brocade</kanji>. It's beautiful, elegant, and worth way more than when it was just a plain towel.
readingMnemonic: You want to keep your <kanji>brocade</kanji> fabrics safe, so you lock them away and seal them in with a <reading>niche key</reading> (にしき). It's niche because brocade is a very niche kind of thing.
